Technology
Military weapons
Tanning
Leather industry and trade
metadata.title: Rapport fait au nom du Comité de salut public, sur les arts qui ont servi à la défense de la République, & sur le nouveau procédé de tannage découvert par le citoyen Armand Seguin /
metadata.creator: Fourcroy, Antoine-François de, comte, 1755-1809.
Fourcroy, Antoine-François de, comte, 1755-1809
France. Convention nationale. Comité de salut public
France. Convention nationale
Imprimerie nationale (France), publisher
metadata.description: At head of title: Convention nationale
"Imprimé par ordre de la Convention nationale."
"Rapport par Fourcroy, du 14 nivôse."--Bottom of p. 9
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Discusses advances in military technology including saltpeter, steel, hot air balloons, the telegraph, and shipbuilding materials, as well as developments in the leather tanning process
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page is on the cover. Skewed text. Damaged, stained, loose pages. Uneven binding.
